Title: Earthquake destruction and the reduction of disaster popularization charts
Notes: "Earthquake destruction and the reduction of disaster popularization charts" (地震灾害与减灾科普挂图) is a 12-poster series published in 1992 by the National Seismological Administration.Entitled "Emergency rescue to reduce losses" (紧急施救 减少损失), this poster illustrates various forms of disaster relief as well as the need to repair essential services like electricity.
